  • Method Details

    • createStorageManagerInternalS3Buckets

      public static Boolean createStorageManagerInternalS3Buckets(String s3AccessKey, String s3SecretAccesKey, String s3Endpoint, String bucketName, String region)
      Creates an internal bucket for use by the Storage Manager itself; passes all exceptions on to the caller
      Parameters:
      s3AccessKey - the access key for the client
      s3SecretAccesKey - the secret access key for the client
      s3Endpoint - the S3 endpoint to connect to
      bucketName - the name of the bucket to create
      region - the region, on which the client shall operate
      Returns:
      true, if the bucket exists or was created successfully, false otherwise

    • checkXml

      public static Boolean checkXml(String xml)
      Check if the provided String represents a valid XML Document
      Parameters:
      xml - the input String
      Returns:
      true, if the string is valid, false otherwise

    • inputStreamToString

      public static String inputStreamToString(InputStream inputStream, Charset charset) throws IOException
      Converts an InputStrem to String
      Parameters:
      inputStream - the input stream to read
      charset - the charset of the string (defaults to UTF-8)
      Returns:
      String a string containing the data of the input stream
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • getFsType

      public static StorageType getFsType(String pathInfo)
      Get the storage type of a given path string
      Parameters:
      pathInfo - the path to check
      Returns:
      the storage type indicated by this path

    • getRelativePath

      public static String getRelativePath(String pathInfo)
      Remove storage dependent path information
      Parameters:
      pathInfo - the full path string
      Returns:
      the path string without the protocol part
